title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 29 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 29 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: He, that being often reproved hardeneth his neck, shall suddenly be destroyed, and that without remedy.
lineList.cn: 人屡次受责罚，仍然硬着颈项，他必顷刻败坏，无法可治。

lineList.en: When the righteous are in authority, the people rejoice: but when the wicked beareth rule, the people mourn.
lineList.cn: 义人增多，民就喜乐。恶人掌权，民就叹息。

lineList.en: Whoso loveth wisdom rejoiceth his father: but he that keepeth company with harlots spendeth his substance.
lineList.cn: 爱慕智慧的，使父亲喜乐。与妓女结交的，却浪费钱财。

lineList.en: The king by judgment establisheth the land: but he that receiveth gifts overthroweth it.
lineList.cn: 王藉公平，使国坚定。索要贿赂，使国倾败。

lineList.en: A man that flattereth his neighbour spreadeth a net for his feet.
lineList.cn: 谄媚邻舍的，就是设网罗绊他的脚。

lineList.en: In the transgression of an evil man there is a snare: but the righteous doth sing and rejoice.
lineList.cn: 恶人犯罪，自陷网罗。惟独义人，欢呼喜乐。

lineList.en: The righteous considereth the cause of the poor: but the wicked regardeth not to know it.
lineList.cn: 义人知道查明穷人的案。恶人没有聪明，就不得而知。

lineList.en: Scornful men bring a city into a snare: but wise men turn away wrath.
lineList.cn: 亵慢人煽惑通城。智慧人止息众怒。

lineList.en: If a wise man contendeth with a foolish man, whether he rage or laugh, there is no rest.
lineList.cn: 智慧人与愚妄人相争，或怒，或笑，总不能使他止息。

lineList.en: The bloodthirsty hate the upright: but the just seek his soul.
lineList.cn: 好流人血的，恨恶完全人。索取正直人的性命。

lineList.en: A fool uttereth all his mind: but a wise man keepeth it in till afterwards.
lineList.cn: 愚妄人怒气全发。智慧人忍气含怒。

lineList.en: If a ruler hearken to lies, all his servants are wicked.
lineList.cn: 君王若听谎言，他一切臣仆都是奸恶。

lineList.en: The poor and the deceitful man meet together: the LORD lighteneth both their eyes.
lineList.cn: 贫穷人，强暴人，在世相遇，他们的眼目，都蒙耶和华光照。

lineList.en: The king that faithfully judgeth the poor, his throne shall be established for ever.
lineList.cn: 君王凭诚实判断穷人，他的国位，必永远坚立。

lineList.en: The rod and reproof give wisdom: but a child left to himself bringeth his mother to shame.
lineList.cn: 杖打和责备，能加增智慧。放纵的儿子，使母亲羞愧。

lineList.en: When the wicked are multiplied, transgression increaseth: but the righteous shall see their fall.
lineList.cn: 恶人加多，过犯也加多。义人必看见他们跌倒。

lineList.en: Correct thy son, and he shall give thee rest; yea, he shall give delight unto thy soul.
lineList.cn: 管教你的儿子，他就使你得安息，也必使你心里喜乐。

lineList.en: Where there is no vision, the people perish: but he that keepeth the law, happy is he.
lineList.cn: 没有异象，（或作默示）民就放肆。惟遵守律法的，便为有福。

lineList.en: A servant will not be corrected by words: for though he understand he will not answer.
lineList.cn: 只用言语，仆人不肯受管教，他虽然明白，也不留意。

lineList.en: Seest thou a man that is hasty in his words? there is more hope of a fool than of him.
lineList.cn: 你见言语急躁的人吗。愚昧人比他更有指望。

lineList.en: He that delicately bringeth up his servant from a child shall have him become his son at the length.
lineList.cn: 人将仆人从小娇养，这仆人终久必成了他的儿子。

lineList.en: An angry man stirreth up strife, and a furious man aboundeth in transgression.
lineList.cn: 好气的人，挑启争端。暴怒的人，多多犯罪。

lineList.en: A man's pride shall bring him low: but honour shall uphold the humble in spirit.
lineList.cn: 人的高傲，必使他卑下。心里谦逊的，必得尊荣。

lineList.en: Whoso is partner with a thief hateth his own soul: he heareth cursing, and bewrayeth it not.
lineList.cn: 人与盗贼分赃，是恨恶自己的性命。他听见叫人发誓的声音，却不言语。

lineList.en: The fear of man bringeth a snare: but whoso putteth his trust in the LORD shall be safe.
lineList.cn: 惧怕人的陷入网罗。惟有倚靠耶和华的，必得安稳。

lineList.en: Many seek the ruler's favour; but every man's judgment cometh from the LORD.
lineList.cn: 求王恩的人多。定人事乃在耶和华。

lineList.en: An unjust man is an abomination to the just: and he that is upright in the way is abomination to the wicked.
lineList.cn: 为非作歹的，被义人憎嫌。行事正直的，被恶人憎恶。
